title: Perceptual Fluency Training Program for Surgical Anatomy Awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level understanding of basic medical terminology and human anatomy
context.additional_context: For pre-service/in-service teachers, establishing smartphone-based learning environments, conducting real surgical video analysis, and performing team-based collaborative projects.

learning_goals: Learners can identify major anatomical structures in real surgical videos with over 85% accuracy
Learners achieve the ability to recognize surgical site-specific landmarks within 3 seconds through visual pattern recognition training
Learners successfully complete three or more surgical anatomy problem-solving scenarios through PBL team activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
